name: Alien Defense Sticks
description:
(PlayStore link below)

Tap the screen to fire. Play with just one finger.

Defend the aliens' offensive until time runs out.

- 11 different guns;

- 4 different aliens;

- 40 levels;

- Unlock infinite mode;

- 3 Difficulties: Easy - Normal - Hard;

- Reload is automatic, wait for gun to reload. If you tap before reload is complete will reset the reload.

- Bullets are unlimited.

- Be accurate to land headshots and do more damage.
